greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which row n lists the odd divisors of n in the order as follows: the smallest, the largest, the second smallest, the second largest, the third smallest, the third largest, and so on.
comment: Also the odd numbers of A210959.
Another version of A182469 from which differs at a(14), or T(9,2).
For a similar version see A261697 from which differs at a(34), or T(18,2).
example: List of divisors of 45 from distinct sequences:
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 21 2015
